HOME.aboutUs: At Mont Everest Masala, we bring the vibrant flavors of the Himalayas straight to your plate. With a rich heritage rooted in authentic Nepalese and Indian culinary traditions, our spices are carefully sourced and blended to perfection, capturing the essence of the majestic mountains. Each bite is a journey through the spice-laden trails of Everest, offering a tantalizing fusion of aromatic spices and exquisite flavors. From our aromatic masalas to our signature blends, we strive to deliver an unforgettable dining experience that celebrates the diversity and depth of Himalayan cuisine. Welcome to Mont Everest Masala, where every meal is a peak experience.
HOME.montrealPera: Conveniently located in downtown Montreal, Mont Everest Masala provides a warm and inviting atmosphere perfect for any occasion. Whether you're here for lunch, dinner, or a quick take away, our service and ambiance will make your dining experience exceptional.
HOME.diversPare: Indulge in our signature dishes like Butter Chicken, Tandoori Chicken, and the best biryani in Montreal. We also offer a variety of vegetarian options such as Veggie Samosa and Veg Pakora. For South Indian flavors, try our dosa masala and other specialties. Don't miss out on our delicious desserts like Gulab Jamun.
HOME.joinUsContact: Join Us at Mont Everest Masala
HOME.joinUsContactPara: Explore why we're considered one of the best Indian restaurants in Montreal. For reservations or to browse our menu, visit our website. We look forward to serving you the finest Indian cuisine in Montreal
HOME.joinus: Welcome to Mont Everest Masala, your premier destination for authentic Indian cuisine in Montreal. Recognized as the best Indian restaurant in Montreal, we offer an extensive menu capturing the rich flavors of both North and South India. From vibrant curries to aromatic tandoori dishes, our culinary team uses the finest ingredients and traditional techniques to ensure every meal is a celebration of Indian cuisine.
HOME.address: 1999 Mont-Royal Ave E, Montreal, Quebec H2H 1J4, Canada

TESTIMONIALS.content: I recently had the pleasure of dining at this exquisite Indian restaurant, and it was nothing short of a delightful experience. Every vegetarian dish I tried was bursting with authentic flavors, perfectly capturing the essence of traditional Indian cuisine. What stood out the most was the restaurant’s flexibility in customizing dishes according to personal taste preferences, a rare find that shows their commitment to customer satisfaction.
TESTIMONIALS.content2: I am basically from Toronto, recently visited Montreal city along with my family and tried Indian food at this wonderful restaurant, I can say food was so good especially butter chicken and tandoori chicken were simply amazing. Butter nan’s were so freshly made as I can literally feel them like i was eating nan’s in India.
TESTIMONIALS.content3: I did a veg party order and all our guests were pretty happy with it. Pretty tasty like home made authentic food, i would definable recommend and also will order in future as well.

blogs.blogheading1: How to Make Authentic Gulab Jamun at Home
blogs.blogpara1: Discover the step-by-step recipe for making authentic Gulab Jamun, a classic Indian dessert. Learn about the ingredients, preparation, and variations like Gulab Jamun cake and ice cream. Perfect for festivals and celebrations.
blogs.gulabheading2: Making Traditional Indian Desserts: A Recipe for Gulab Jamun Recipe
blogs.gulabpara1: Indian cuisine is renowned for its rich and diverse range of desserts, each offering unique flavors and textures.Among these delightful treats, Gulab Jamun holds a special place. This delectable dessert is a staple in Indian festivals, weddings, and celebrations. If you have a sweet tooth and a penchant for Indian cuisine, learning how to make Gulab Jamun is a must. In this blog post, we will guide you through the process of creating these mouthwatering, syrup-soaked dumplings in the comfort of your own kitchen.
blogs.gulabpara2: Gulab Jamun is essentially a deep-fried dough ball, traditionally made from milk solids known as khoya or mawa, which are then soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup flavoured with rosewater and cardamom. The name Gulab Jamun tself is derived from Persian and Arabic words, where Gulab means rosewater and Jamun refers to a fruit with a similar size and shape. This mouthwatering treat has a rich history and a unique taste that leaves a lastingimpression on anyone who savours it.
blogs.garlicNaanheading: Preparing the Dough for the Best Garlic Naan
blogs.garlicNaanpara2: There's something truly irresistible about biting into a soft and slightly charred piece of garlic naan, isn't there? This delectable Indian flatbread has become a staple in cuisines around the world, and the key to its perfection lies in the dough preparation. Whether you're an amateur home cook or a seasoned chef,mastering the art of preparing naan dough can elevate your culinary skills to new heights.
blogs.tandooriChickenpara: Tandoori chicken is a renowned Indian dish known for its vibrant red hue, smoky essence, and robust flavour profile. The origins of this dish can be traced back to the northern region of India, particularly Punjab. The name tandoori is derived from the cooking method itself, which involves using a tandoor, a clay oven that dates back centuries.
blogs.masalaTeapara: Tandoori chicken is a renowned Indian dish known for its vibrant red hue, smoky essence, and robust flavour profile. The origins of this dish can be traced back to the northern region of India, particularly Punjab. The name tandoori is derived from the cooking method itself, which involves using a tandoor, a clay oven that dates back centuries.
blogs.beefCurrypara: Beef curry, with its tantalizing aroma and rich flavors, is a culinary delight that satisfies both meat enthusiasts and spice lovers alike. While a classic beef curry recipe is already delicious on its own, there are countless variations that can take this dish to new heights of flavor and enjoyment. Here, we explore some creative twists and enhancements to make your beef curry even more delectable.
blogs.cucumberSaladpara: Discover how to create the perfect cucumber salad with crisp cucumbers, red onions, fresh dill, and a tangy dressing. Learn serving tips and the nutritional benefits of this hydrating and low-calorie dish!
